name: circumcision
content:

the act of cutting the protecting loose skin off a boy's penis, for medical, traditional, or religious reasons, or an occasion when this is done: Circumcision is an important rite in a number of religions. He conducts weddings, funerals, and ritual circumcisions. See
circumcise
